# Mikhail Semenov

Personal portfolio site focused on product engineering, practical AI integration, and weekly progress updates.

## Canonical site
- https://rebsem.ru/

## Main pages
- Home: https://rebsem.ru/
- About: https://rebsem.ru/about
- Blog index: https://rebsem.ru/blog

## Content notes
- Blog posts are published in RU and EN.
- Language is switchable in the UI and matched to browser preference by default.
- Portfolio projects and engineering notes are maintained directly in this repository.
